intent_atoms.description: Add macOS SwiftUI automation for streaming selection defaults to ensure tree/detail panes update end-to-end during live parses.
Verify default selection and detail synchronization during a streaming parse run using ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests in the app test suite.
Execute Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics while maintaining throughput parity with the CLI harness.
Combine must be available on the platform for the benchmark to run; XCTest skips scenarios on Linux where Combine is unavailable.
Surface global logging and telemetry toggles once streaming metrics are exposed to the CLI.

functional_units.name: macOS SwiftUI automation for streaming selection defaults
